content.title: Backend Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

experience.description: 3–5 years of backend software development experience

responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable backend APIs
Optimize database queries and application performance
Implement microservices and RESTful APIs
Collaborate with frontend engineers, product managers, and DevOps teams
Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards
requirements: Strong proficiency in Python and FastAPI
Experience with relational and NoSQL databases
Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms (AWS preferred)
Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and design patterns
Ability to troubleshoot, debug, and optimize existing systems
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Backend Engineer skilled in Python and FastAPI to build scalable, high-quality APIs, manage databases, and implement microservices. The ideal candidate is collaborative, ownership-driven, and experienced in cloud deployment.

content.title: Frontend Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
preferred: Master's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Develop responsive and dynamic user interfaces using React and TypeScript
Optimize application performance and load times
Integrate frontend with backend APIs
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and accessibility standards
Collaborate with designers, backend engineers, and product managers
requirements: Strong proficiency in React and TypeScript
Experience with modern CSS frameworks and preprocessors
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and JSON
Knowledge of testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress) and CI/CD pipelines
Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Frontend Engineer with expertise in React and TypeScript to build responsive, performant, and user-friendly interfaces. The ideal candidate collaborates effectively and prioritizes user experience.

content.title: Fullstack Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
preferred: Master's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Design and develop scalable frontend and backend systems
Integrate APIs and microservices end-to-end
Collaborate with designers, product managers, and engineers across the stack
Maintain high code quality, testing, and CI/CD practices
Troubleshoot and optimize application performance
requirements: Proficiency in Python, FastAPI, JavaScript, and React
Experience with relational databases and cloud platforms
Strong understanding of web architecture, REST APIs, and microservices
Familiarity with Docker, CI/CD, and testing frameworks
Ability to take ownership and deliver end-to-end solutions
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Fullstack Engineer skilled in Python, FastAPI, and React to build robust, end-to-end applications. The ideal candidate is collaborative, adaptable, and experienced in scalable software development.

content.title: Backend Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Develop and maintain backend services using Java and Spring Boot
Design database schemas and optimize queries
Implement RESTful APIs and microservices
Collaborate with frontend engineers and DevOps teams
requirements: Strong knowledge of Java and Spring Boot
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Familiarity with cloud platforms and containerization
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Backend Engineer with expertise in Java and Spring Boot to build scalable backend services and APIs.

content.title: Frontend Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
Implement UI components and optimize performance
Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate APIs
Ensure cross-browser and accessibility compliance
requirements: Strong proficiency in React and TypeScript
Experience with CSS frameworks and testing tools
Knowledge of REST APIs and frontend architecture
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Frontend Engineer skilled in React and TypeScript to build high-quality, responsive interfaces.

content.title: Fullstack Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Build scalable frontend and backend systems
Integrate APIs and services across the stack
Maintain high code quality and CI/CD practices
Collaborate across teams to deliver features end-to-end
requirements: Proficiency in Python, FastAPI, and React
Experience with relational databases and cloud platforms
Strong understanding of web architecture and microservices
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Fullstack Engineer skilled in Python, FastAPI, and React to develop robust end-to-end applications.

content.title: Fullstack Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Develop and maintain fullstack applications using Java/Spring Boot and Angular
Integrate frontend with backend APIs
Design scalable services and optimize performance
Participate in code reviews and ensure best practices
requirements: Strong knowledge of Java, Spring Boot, Angular
Experience with SQL databases
Understanding of RESTful services and microservices architecture
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Fullstack Engineer skilled in Java, Spring Boot, and Angular to deliver end-to-end solutions.

content.title: DevOps Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Automate deployment and infrastructure provisioning
Monitor and optimize system performance and reliability
Collaborate with developers to support application lifecycle
requirements: Hands-on experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
Knowledge of infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform/Ansible)
Strong scripting skills (Python/Bash)
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level DevOps Engineer to design CI/CD pipelines, automate deployments, and ensure system reliability.

content.title: Machine Learning Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field

responsibilities: Design, train, and deploy ML models
Develop data pipelines and preprocessing scripts
Collaborate with engineers and product teams for model integration
Monitor and optimize model performance
requirements: Proficiency in Python and ML frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
Experience with SQL and data processing pipelines
Knowledge of model deployment best practices
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Machine Learning Engineer skilled in Python and ML frameworks to design, deploy, and optimize ML models.

content.title: Data Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Data Science, or related field

responsibilities: Design and maintain data pipelines and ETL processes
Ensure data quality and consistency across sources
Collaborate with ML engineers and analysts
Optimize queries and storage for performance
requirements: Strong SQL and Python skills
Experience with ETL frameworks and cloud data warehouses
Understanding of data modeling and data governance
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Data Engineer skilled in Python and SQL to design and maintain scalable data pipelines.

content.title: Mobile Engineer (iOS)

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Develop and maintain iOS applications
Implement new features based on requirements
Collaborate with backend engineers for API integration
Ensure app performance, security, and responsiveness
requirements: Proficiency in Swift and iOS development tools
Experience with REST APIs and mobile UI frameworks
Strong debugging and testing skills
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level iOS Engineer skilled in Swift to develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications.

content.title: Mobile Engineer (Android)

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Develop and maintain Android applications
Implement features based on product requirements
Collaborate with backend engineers for API integration
Ensure app performance, security, and responsiveness
requirements: Proficiency in Kotlin and Android development tools
Experience with REST APIs and mobile UI frameworks
Strong debugging and testing skills
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Android Engineer skilled in Kotlin to develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications.

content.title: Site Reliability Engineer

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

responsibilities: Ensure availability, reliability, and performance of production systems
Design monitoring, alerting, and automated remediation tools
Collaborate with engineering teams for deployment and scaling
Participate in on-call rotation and incident response
requirements: Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure and container orchestration
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automation
Strong scripting and troubleshooting skills
content.template_text: We are seeking a Mid-Level Site Reliability Engineer to maintain high availability, scalability, and performance of production systems.
